text: Eurotherium is an extinct genus of proviverrine hyaenodontid from the Eocene of Eurasia. The genus was established by Polly and Lange-Badré in 1993 for two previously described species Prototomus theriodis (Van Valen, 1965) and Allopterodon matthesi (Lange-Badré & Haubold, 1990). Eurotherium was a small, scansorial insectivore or carnivore that was closely related or ancestral to the derived subgroup Hyaenodontinae. ==References== Category:Hyaenodonts Category:Eocene mammals
title: Eurotherium
